entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 11:29AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds across portions of southeast Kansas. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
